name: Underture
description:
UNDERTURE is a short 6DoF immersive VR experience set in the New York City subway. The train platform, emptied of all other people, becomes a private performance space for a real-life busking musician. Multi-axis freedom of movement, combined with spatialized audio, creates a uniquely immersive and transporting experience for the viewer.

Please note: no manual input after launch (including keyboard/mouse). This is a passive experience.
